availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abell C. Weatherford (Casey County, Kentucky, physician and veteran surgeon (U.S.A.))

body.p: Casey County, Kentucky, physician and soldier. Physician in Casey County, Kentucky in 1860. Mustered in as veteran surgeon in 13th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) on December 23, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Casey County, District 3, p. 390.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 352.
